titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued to honor Wilton "Wilt" Chamberlain.
Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued to honor Wilton "Wilt" Chamberlain.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Urges the United States Postal Service to issue a commemorative stamp to honor Wilton "Wilt" Chamberlain.
